txt.en: 'Let us provide the right impetus for corruption. Legs of the Free Men will prove a potent mash to force through the soil. Go into the Ettenmoors and claim men. Slaughter them and acquire their legs so that we may mash them into the soil and feed the roots of the sapling from their blood.'
'You are commended. We will grind these legs into meat that will mix with the soil and feed the sapling. It will grow fond of the taste and become a potent ally.'
To corrupt the sapling, the Angmarim leadership devises a terrible way to nurture a bloodlust within the sapling.
Deliver the legs of man to Cinaid at Gramsfoot
'Go forth and remove the legs of the feeble men of the south so that we may feed your charge.'
Cinaid asked you to collect legs of men to mash into the soil that feeds your sapling. Getting the taste for the blood of Men will defile the sapling.
Deliver legs of Men to Cinaid at Gramsfoot ([placeholder]/7)
